DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively assess heal process follow suture profound fexor tendon due traumatic rupture FDP-Tendon Zone II ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: FLEX-Trial : Prospective Sonographic Assessment Of Healing Process Following Suture Profound Flexor Tendon Due Traumatic Rupture FDP-Tendon Zone II .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : All patient traumatic rupture FDPtendon zone II . Exclusion criterion : < 18years ; Fracture ; crush injury ; ( partial ) amputation ; RA ; CPPD ; CP ;
